scripts.ncs:dev: dotenvx run -f compose.dev.env -- docker compose -f compose.dev.yml up -d --pull always --force-recreate -V --wait
scripts.ncs:up: dotenvx run -f compose.${NCS_ENV}.env -- docker compose -f compose.${NCS_ENV}.yml up -d --pull always --force-recreate -V --wait
scripts.ncs:down: dotenvx run -f compose.${NCS_ENV}.env -- docker compose -f compose.${NCS_ENV}.yml down
scripts.ncs:migrate: dotenvx run -f compose.${NCS_ENV}.env -- docker compose -f compose.migrate.yml up -d --pull always --force-recreate -V --wait && npm run prisma:migrate:deploy && npm run prisma:db:seed && dotenvx run -f compose.prod.env -- docker compose -f compose.migrate.yml down
scripts.mariadb:backup: mkdir -p backup && docker container exec ncs-mariadb-${NCS_ENV} bash -c 'mariadb-dump -A -u root -p${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}' > backup/${NCS_ENV}-$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S).sql
scripts.mariadb:restore: docker container exec ncs-mariadb-${NCS_ENV} bash -c 'mariadb -u root -p${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}' <
scripts.prisma:db:pull: dotenvx run -f prisma.${NCS_ENV}.env -- prisma db pull
scripts.prisma:db:push: dotenvx run -f prisma.${NCS_ENV}.env -- prisma db push
scripts.prisma:db:seed: dotenvx run -f prisma.${NCS_ENV}.env -- prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: dotenvx run -f prisma.dev.env -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:reset: dotenvx run -f prisma.dev.env -- prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy: dotenvx run -f prisma.${NCS_ENV}.env -- prisma migrate deploy
